title: 95/181/EC: Commission Decision of 17 May 1995 amending Decision 94/85/EC drawing up a list of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of fresh poultrymeat (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 17 May 1995 amending Decision  94/85/EC drawing up a list of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of  fresh poultrymeat (Text with EEA relevance) (95/181/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex to Commission Decision 94/85/EC the following line is  inserted in accordance with the alphabetic order of the ISO-code:
>TABLE>
This Decision shall apply from 1 May 1995.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 May 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
